about_me:
Hi there, I am Joel. 
Currently pursuing Software Engineering Technology at Centennial College, Toronto. I enjoy being challenged and be engaged with projects that require me to work outside my comfort and knowledge set. I like idealization of new ideas and concepts. I have worked on React-Native, ReactJS which enabled me to develop mobile and web applications. I always look forward to learning something new. Currently mastering JavaScript, Java and various frameworks.
I even do UI/UX designing. I have experience with Adobe XD, Figma and Zeplin. This portfolio has been developed using React* from scratch and deployed on Github Pages.
asterisk: * yeah I know, you are gonna say why is he using react, why not just html, well it gives me some credit that I know react
